name: Steel Heel Jam
description:
Welcome to the Jam! Steel Heel Jam is a local multiplayer, up to 8 player wrestling/brawling game. Face off against your friends or computer controlled bots to be the last player standing. Flex in the spotlight to get buffs that last throughout the match. Flex in enough spotlights and you will ignite the Heel Fire that launches any nearby opponents away! A variety of weapons thrown in by the audience is at your disposal.

Credits:

Nick Baker, Brian Kiss, Joshua Quinones, Sam Lambermont

Voice Acting: Kieran Newell as "Colonel Muenster"
